hero.title: Testimonials
hero.subtitle: What families say about My Private Tutor Online
hero.description: Since 2010, My Private Tutor Online has helped hundreds of students achieve their academic goals.

mainContent.intro: We're proud to say we've never spent a penny on marketing or paid advertising — our tutors are consistently in demand through personal word-of-mouth referrals alone.
mainContent.callToAction: Here's what a selection of families have to say about their experience with us. We are always happy to share references for specific tutors upon request.

video.title: TESTIMONIALS VIDEO JULY 2025 MPTO
video.description: Hear from our families about their experience with My Private Tutor Online

schoolsTitle: WE HELP CLIENTS SECURE PLACES AT THE TOP EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS IN THE WORLD

recentTestimonials.quote: Elizabeth's team was the only one that actually delivered what they promised. Our daughter secured her place at Westminster School with their expert guidance.
recentTestimonials.author: Sarah M.
recentTestimonials.subject: English & Mathematics

recentTestimonials.quote: Your tutors are next level. We couldn't have done it without you. Both children achieved their Oxbridge offers!
recentTestimonials.author: James & Victoria P.
recentTestimonials.subject: Sciences & Mathematics

recentTestimonials.quote: Annika scored a 7 in her GCSE retake. We are thrilled—it's such an improvement on the 4 she got in summer.
recentTestimonials.author: Maria L.
recentTestimonials.subject: Mathematics

recentTestimonials.quote: Thank you for making my child believe in themselves again. The transformation in confidence has been remarkable.

recentTestimonials.quote: We were delighted to hear all three children were accepted into Le Rosey. Your preparation was absolutely invaluable.

recentTestimonials.quote: The tutor you matched us with understood exactly what the Eton entrance exams required. Our son is now thriving there.

recentTestimonials.quote: It's a full house - offers from St Pauls, Westminster, Highgate and UCS. We can't believe it!

recentTestimonials.subject: 11+ Preparation

recentTestimonials.quote: Brian and Gloria's teaching style is just right - not lecturing but engaging and really growing her enthusiasm for the subjects.
recentTestimonials.author: Ms Adebayo, New York
recentTestimonials.subject: Gifted & Talented Programme

recentTestimonials.quote: Newsflash! Thanks to you Jake has jumped from a U to two marks off a B - incredible progress in just a month and he really believes he's capable again.
recentTestimonials.author: Mr & Mrs Meritt-Jones, Hampstead
recentTestimonials.subject: A-Level Support

recentTestimonials.quote: My twins have always struggled with Science and Maths. They also have ADHD and dyspraxia. I was determined that they would pass their GCSE exams and get at least a 5. Their tutors were unbelievable and the boys walked away with a 7 and an 8 grade respectively. We are thrilled!
recentTestimonials.author: Mr Richardson, Highgate
recentTestimonials.subject: SEN Science & Mathematics

recentTestimonials.quote: Annika scored a 7 in her GCSE retake. We are THRILLED. It's such an improvement on the 4 she got in the summer!
recentTestimonials.author: Mr Gupta, Bath
recentTestimonials.subject: GCSE Mathematics

recentTestimonials.quote: My tutor was amazing. He helped me craft a personal statement to stand out from the competition and also coached me for the interview - I got an offer from Oxford!
recentTestimonials.author: Aryan
recentTestimonials.subject: Politics & Personal Statement
recentTestimonials.result: Politics Student, Balliol College, Oxford University

recentTestimonials.quote: The average score for Cambridge's TMUA test is 4.5. Our daughter scored 6.8, so we are delighted with that result! Huge thanks to you and Brandon for helping her achieve such an incredible result and secure her Cambridge offer!
recentTestimonials.author: Anonymous Parent
recentTestimonials.subject: TMUA & Mathematics
recentTestimonials.result: Maths Student, Churchill College, Cambridge University

recentTestimonials.quote: The world of tutoring is a minefield but your tutors are next level.

recentTestimonials.subject: GCSE Support

aboutTestimonials.quote: Elizabeth's approach is simply exceptional. Our daughter went from struggling with confidence to achieving top grades and securing her place at Westminster. The transformation was remarkable.

aboutTestimonials.quote: As featured in Tatler, My Private Tutor Online represents the gold standard in educational excellence. The calibre of tutors and results speak for themselves.

aboutTestimonials.quote: Our son went from predicted C grades to achieving A*A*A at A-Level. The Oxbridge preparation was exceptional - he's now reading Natural Sciences at Cambridge.

aboutTestimonials.quote: Working with Elizabeth's team has been transformational. The tutors don't just teach - they inspire. Our children have developed a genuine love of learning.

aboutTestimonials.subject: Long-term Family Support

aboutTestimonials.quote: The level of personalisation and attention to detail is unmatched. Elizabeth personally ensures every match is perfect for the child's needs and learning style.

aboutTestimonials.quote: After trying several tutoring companies, My Private Tutor Online was in a league of its own. The results exceeded our expectations completely.
